name: Hunters of Vice
description:
Traverse through a hazardous forest to vanquish an unnatural phenomenon known as Vice.

Choose between one of the character classes with different playstyles and abilities. 

Defeat a variety of monsters along the way to gain levels and unlock powerful skills. 

Collect shards to enhance the shop and receive new weapons and armor for purchase.

Controls/Tips

WASD  for movement.

Click and move the left mouse button to rotate the camera.

Skills can be shifted around in the skill bar with the mouse.

Skills can be set back into the skill bar from the skill menu with the mouse.

The num lock keys can also be used to activate skills.
